name: CURSE & CARRY
description:
MADE FOR KENNEY JAM 2020

created in partnership with https://itch.io/profile/kmk-pdx 💚

You play as a temp worker at a shop that sells curses.  The goal is to create custom curses according to the customers needs!

Click ingredients to add them to your ritual.  Once you have 3 ingredients, mash the "Perform Ritual" button to finish the ritual!

Hover over ingredients to see a hint.

Finish your day at work to submit a high score!!!

Source code can be found here: https://github.com/jp00p/CURSE
